reviews.title: Lovely views in a picturesque town
reviews.text: Lovely house, but a bit difficult to find - high up on a hill just above the town of Kinsale. Make sure to follow the directions exactly or you'll end up driving out the other side of town by mistake, or going up the wrong hill and having no way to turn around! The driveway is sort of long and narrow, but there's room enough for everyone to park, as long as you're considerate about it.

reviews.title: Best ever!
reviews.text: John, the host was very helpful in providing dining recommendations and a fold out map of the town. He's also great at responding to email if you email them directly.
